creator: brad@langhorst.com
text:
That doc was the first place i looked for information about how to setup an SSL
server...

It doesn't mention that you must add that directive to a virtual host to enable
ssl support...

creator: rbowen@apache.org
text: Moving docs bugs to docs@httpd.a.o ownership.

creator: rbowen@apache.org
text: I would go so far as to say that the SSL Howto really needs to be completely rewritten. But, yes, at a minimum it needs to say how to configure an SSL server.

creator: rbowen@apache.org
text:
Added in r1031028
Sorry for the seven year delay.
